attributes.action: ask the police forces of the UK to enforce the highway code in respect of a pedestrains' rights when using a zebra crossing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The highway code says in item 195 "As you approach a zebra crossing you should look out for pedestrians waiting to cross and be ready to slow down or stop to let them cross and you MUST give way when a pedestrian has moved onto a crossing."

Pedestrians lifes across the country are  being put at risk because drivers do not  follow the highway code near zebra crossing. 

This petition is to request the Prime Minister asks the police forces of the UK to pro-actively  monitor zebra crossing and issue fixed penalty notices (where appropriate) for drivers who do not give right of way to pedestrians.
